mapper.select: SELECT /* UseableDevice.searchProductBasicInfo, 상품 기본정보(서비스 그룹) 조회 , 이석희/아이에스플러스, 2014-03-28 */ A.PROD_ID , A.SVC_GRP_CD , A.SVC_TYPE_CD , A.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD , A.META_CLSF_CD , A.TOP_MENU_ID FROM TB_DP_PROD A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PROD_ID = #{productId}

SELECT /* UseableDeviceMapper.selectUseableDeviceForOther, 이용가능 단말 조회(서비스 그룹코드 : DP000201, DP000205 제외), 이석희/IS-Plus, 2014-03-17 */ TOTAL_COUNT , RNUM , PROD_ID , DEVICE_MODEL_CD , MODEL_NM AS DEVICE_MODEL_NM , MNFT_COMP_CD , MAKE_COMP_NM AS MNFT_COMP_NM , NET_COMP , LCD_SIZE , COLOR_DEPTH , AUDIO_TYPE , AUDIO_POLY , TOUCH_SCREEN_YN , CAMERA_SPRT_YN , BLUETOOTH_SPRT_YN , GPS_SPRT_YN , EXTRR_MEM_YN , ITOPP_V4_SPRT_YN , LIST_IMAGE_PATH , DTL_IMAGE_PATH , SOUND_3D_SPRT_YN FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTAL_COUNT , ROWNUM AS RNUM , #{productId} AS PROD_ID , A.DEVICE_MODEL_CD , A.MODEL_NM , A.MNFT_COMP_CD , SPSAC.FC_GET_CM_CD_NM(A.MNFT_COMP_CD, #{langCd}) AS MAKE_COMP_NM , SPSAC.FC_GET_CM_CD_NM(A.CMNT_COMP_CD, #{langCd}) AS NET_COMP , SPSAC.FC_GET_CM_CD_NM(A.LCD_SIZE_CD, #{langCd}) AS LCD_SIZE , SPSAC.FC_GET_CM_CD_NM(A.COLOR_CD, #{langCd}) AS COLOR_DEPTH , SPSAC.FC_GET_CM_CD_NM(A.AUDIO_TYPE_CD,#{langCd}) AS AUDIO_TYPE , SPSAC.FC_GET_CM_CD_NM(A.AUDIO_POLY_CD,#{langCd}) AS AUDIO_POLY , A.TOUCH_SCREEN_YN , A.CAMERA_SPRT_YN , A.BLUETOOTH_SPRT_YN , A.GPS_SPRT_YN , A.EXTRR_MEM_YN , A.ITOPP_V4_SPRT_YN , REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE( NVL(A.LIST_IMG_PATH, '/images/no_imgage/phone_68_68.gif') , '/data/img', '/images'), '/data/wipi', '/wipiimages'), '/data/common', '/common') AS LIST_IMAGE_PATH , REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE( NVL(A.DTL_IMG_PATH, '/images/no_imgage/phone_68_68.gif') , '/data/img', '/images'), '/data/wipi', '/wipiimages'), '/data/common', '/common') AS DTL_IMAGE_PATH , A.SOUND_3D_SPRT_YN FROM TB_CM_DEVICE A WHERE 1=1
AND A.VIDEO_DRM_SPRT_YN ='Y' AND (A.SD_VIDEO_SPRT_YN ='Y' OR A.HDV_SPRT_YN ='Y')
AND A.MUSIC_SPRT_YN ='Y'
AND A.EBOOK_SPRT_YN ='Y'
AND A.COMIC_SPRT_YN ='Y'
AND NVL(A.VERIFY_DVC_YN, 'N') = 'N' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.REP_DEVICE_YN = 'Y'
AND (UPPER(A.MODEL_NM) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{deviceModelNm})||'%' OR UPPER(A.DEVICE_MODEL_CD) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{deviceModelNm})||'%')
AND MNFT_COMP_CD = #{mnftCompCd}
ORDER BY A.REG_DT ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{offset} AND #{count}
